channel.title: Editor on A weblog of sorts
channel.description: Recent content in Editor on A weblog of sorts

item.title: Websites, Editors, Religion
item.description: First thing’s first - I moved this from bollu.github.io to pixel-druid.com. I’ve had this domain for around a year now, but I never got around to do anything with it. The excuse that I was using was that “there is no space on my EC2 instance”, which makes no real sense when you think about it, since it was a fresh off-the-shelf Ubuntu install. It turns out that nginx wrote out an error log file into /etc/nginx/error.
